transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Yes sir, good morning. IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu customer team se sir bataiye kaise help kar sakti hu.
Customer: Mujhe bolna bolna tha aapko Kolkata ka office number bataiye kya?
Executive: Sir Kolkata mein sir dekhiye aapki service jo hai na head office Noida mein hai. To Kolkata mein bhi agar aap number dete hain aap bhi chahte hain to waha pe koi aise aapko help nahi kar payega. Kyunki aapka sara data to IndiaMART head office Noida mein hi hai. Waha pe wo access hi nahi kar payenge ise. Kuch query hai kuch service ke regarding to bataiye sir main aapko help karti hu. Kyunki yaha pe main check kar rahi thi aise apna I think renewal bhi due hai. To aapke jo account manager hai wo bhi aapko connect kar rahe the. Issue aa raha hai sir service mein. Aapka kaun bol raha hai abhi?
Customer: Aapka kaun bol raha hai abhi?
Executive: Anisha.
Customer: Anisha. Haan ji. Achha sir na issue kuch nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Bataiye sir main help karti hu. Mujhe kuch MDC mein kuch discount ho raha tha kuch.
Customer: Mujhe kuch MDC mein kuch discount ho raha tha kuch.
Executive: Sir main aapko batati hu. MDC apna waise jo abhi current price hai sir wo 32000 plus GST hai. Thik hai but jaise aap hamare itne purane customer hai vintage customer hai aur aapka renewal bhi due hai. To aapko jo discount karke renewal wale price mein aapko jo padega sir 28000 plus GST ka one year ka. Thik hai. Aur usse usse usse jyada discount nahi milega?
Customer: Thik hai. Aur usse usse usse jyada discount nahi milega?
Executive: Nahi sir ye last price hai jo hum aapko de sakte hain otherwise agar aap online bhi process karte ho ya branch mein kahin bhi jaate hain tab bhi aapko ye 32 plus GST hi padega jo ki aapka GST laga ke aata hai 37760 rupees. But ye ki aapki company IndiaMART head office mein hai aur renewal aapka end date pe hai jiski wajah se aapko ye 28000 plus GST aapka amount pad raha hai. Thik hai aur agar yahi sir agar aap teen saal mein jaate hain to teen saal ka waise apna costing padta hai 72000 plus GST aur wo aapko discount mein padega 65000 plus GST. To three years wale mein aapke liye per year costing mein thoda sa benefit aapko mil jata hai ki yaha pe aapko 28 plus GST per year costing ek saal mein padega. Wahi teen saal mein aapko ye 21000 plus GST padta hai agar aap 65 plus GST mein jaate hain aur teen saal tak aapko sir matlab koi renewal nahi karane ki zarurat hai. 2028 tak apni service extend ho jayegi. Aap yahi karwa sakte hain sir three years mein ja sakte hain aap. Achha mera service ka renewal renewal kab hai thoda dekhiye kya?
Customer: Achha mera service ka renewal renewal kab hai thoda dekhiye kya?
Executive: Main bata deti hu ek minute sir. Sir aapki jo due date aa rahi hai yaha pe wo 30 tarikh ki aa rahi hai.
Customer: 30 tarikh ko?
Executive: Haan aur ye ki Saturday Sunday hamara office close hai to us samay aapka renewal nahi ho payega in case agar aap payment karte hain to service activate nahi ho payegi. To ye ki agar aap aaj karwa sakte hain aaj kal mein to aap karwa sakte hain sir. Baki ki best price maine aapko ek saal mein bhi bata diya hai aur teen saal mein bhi aapko bata diya hai.
Customer: Achha. Thik hai thik hai.
Executive: But main to aapko suggest karungi sir ki agar aap dekhiye aap itne time se IndiaMART ke sath jude hue hain almost aapki company ko 14 years ho gaye hain IndiaMART pe bahut lamba time hai sir right. To abhi aap har saal ek ek saal ka renewal karate hain 28000 se pehle bhi aapne 28000 pay kiya tha. To har saal sir ek ek matlab amount pay karna 28000 se ke bhi aap lagaoge tabhi aapka 80000 se upar hi jayega. But bhai aap agar teen saal ka ek sath kar rahe hain to company aapko benefit de rahi hai aap 65000 plus GST mein aapko teen saal ka pad raha hai aur teen saal tak aapko koi renewal ki tension hi nahi leni padegi sir.
Customer: Haan. Thik hai thik hai.
Executive: To aap teen saal wala hi finalize kar dete hain.
Customer: Achha thik hai dekhta hu.
Executive: Hai na baki ka main aapko isme ek cheez aapko bataungi agar aap teen saal wale mein jaate hain sir to agar aap aaj online payment karte hain sir last time bhi aapne UPI se kiya tha to ispe ek additional 2% ka online payment pe UPI pe mere paas online payment pe discount hai teen saal wale mein to wo aapka 65 plus GST ki jagah wo aapko padega 63700 plus GST three years ke liye sir.
Customer: Achha thik hai samajh gaya bolte aur hai jo hai wo jo foreign buyer hai na foreign buyer. Uske uske liye uske ki alag se karna padta hai?
Executive: Haan sir wo export ka apna pura package hi alag hota hai verified exporter service ke naam se hota hai jisme aapko 10 leads per week milti hai thik hai ek saal ka package hota hai jiski aapki costing hai sir 120000 plus GST ek saal ke liye. Thik hai aur isme jaise aapko ek verified exporter ka logo bhi provide kiya jayega catalog pe jo koi bhi buyer dekh payega ki aap IndiaMART ke verified exporter supplier hai. Thoda sa trust factor foreign buyer ke samne aapka badh jata hai aur aapka IndiaMART ke catalog pe export ka logo laga hota hai. Baki ye aapko 120 plus GST ka padega.
Customer: Sir chota chota ye nahi hai ek saal ka jagah mein teen mahina chhe mahine ka?
Executive: Nahi nahi sir ek saal ka.
Customer: Sir chota chota ye nahi hai ek saal ka jagah mein teen mahina chhe mahine ka?
Executive: Nahi sir ek saal ka hi aata hai ya fir aapka teen saal ke liye aata hai. But ye ki ek saal wala aapko discount karke 115000 plus GST ka padega exporter wala package.
Customer: Achha achha achha.
Executive: Haan but wo proper aapka pure export service ke liye hai.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Sir dekh lijiye bataiye aap matlab kis mein aap finalize karte ho to main aapko uska proposal share kar deti hu aap usko process kar lijiye sir ek saal ya teen saal ka but mera recommendation sir strongly aapko teen saal ka hi rahega aap itne purane customer ho har saal dekhiye 33000 30000 pe bharne se achha hai ek bar mein kara ke teen saal tak ke liye aap free ho jaiye har saal aapko bar bar call bhi nahi aayenge pareshani bhi nahi hogi. Thik hai aapko pata hai sir kitne kafi bar call karte hain service ke liye aapko bhi disturbance hota hai. Teen saal tak aapki service aise chalti rahegi aapki sir.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai main ek bar dekhta hu.
Executive: Main to waise aapko best yaha pe price kara diya hai 63700 plus GST. Hmm. Thik hai baki sir aapne aise call kiya tha customer care pe to aapka ek ticket open ho jata hai to jaise bhi aapne jo bhi query thi maine aapko guide kiya renewal ke amount ke regarding mein to main abhi aapka ye feedback ticket close kar du sir?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan ticket close kar du sir?
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai to aap mujhe bataiye sir ki main kab tak aapse call kar lu kab tak aap mujhe bata payenge main fir uske accordingly aapko proposal share kar dungi ek saal ka ya teen saal ka kyuki service activation karane mein hame do se teen din ka time lagta hi lagta hai. Aapke Vasundhara Durg bol raha hai kya?
Customer: Aapke Vasundhara Durg bol raha hai kya?
Executive: Kya bol rahe hain sir?
Customer: Vasundhara Durg Durg.
Executive: Anisha. Vasundhara Durga aapki jo account manager hai Swati unki manager hai sir.
Customer: Achha achha.
Executive: Swati aaj busy hai. Thik hai madam thik hai madam main jo renew hai wo 30 tarikh ke pehle hi karunga.
Customer: Swati aaj busy hai. Thik hai madam thik hai madam main jo renew hai wo 30 tarikh ke pehle hi karunga.
Executive: Sir dekhiye nahi kar sakte sir na main aapko bhi bata rahi hu 29 aur 30 tarikh Saturday Sunday office close rehta hai. Thik hai to aaj 26 tarikh hai agar aap aaj payment karte ho main to aapko discount kara ke de hi rahi hu sir ek saal wale pe bhi teen saal wale pe bhi aur main aapko isme ek extra valid ka package bhi kara dungi jisme aapko 15 on laps valid milegi jo ki aapke account mein ek saal tak valid rahegi. Kyunki hame service activation karane mein do din ka time lagta hai. Aur agar aap sir bolte hain aapko apne account manager ya unki manager se Vasundhara se call back chahiye to main unko bol deti hu wo call back kar lengi aapko.
Customer: Na wo to to sakta hi hai. Thik hai koi baat nahi main 30 tarikh ke pehle hi renew karunga sochiye bol raha hu.
Executive: Sir 30 tarikh tak 30 tarikh tak mat jaiye teen saal tak mat jaiye aaj kal mein bilkul possible nahi hai aaj bilkul possible nahi hai sir teen saal mein to itna best price karaya maine aapke liye. Dekh lijiye agar aaj ho pata hai to sir aaj kar lijiye.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai main baat karta hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants Kolkata office number.

- Enquired about discount on MDC.

- Enquired about foreign buyer package.

- Wants to renew before the 30th.



Resolution:

- Informed Kolkata office is not useful.

- Explained MDC discount and renewal options.

- Explained verified exporter service package.

- Explained the office will be closed on the 29th and 30th.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share the proposal.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- renewal, discount, exporter package, payment
